EmailTemplate.name: 2018BK-09 Promotion for the KX 165A NavCom Radio with 8.33kHz Com Channel Spacin
EmailTemplate.subject: 2018 BendixKing Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | February 22, 2018
BendixKing would like to present to you the following 2018 Sales Bulletins. The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins are available at MyAerospace/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log-in to view these bulletins.
Dealer Sales Bulletin:
2018BK-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK-09 Promotion for the KX 165A NavCom Radio with 8.33kHz Com Channel Spacing.pdf]]> Promotion for the KX 165A Nav/Com radio with 8.33kHz channel spacing. BendixKing is pleased to offer a price discount and trade-in promotion for the KX 165A navigation and communication radio for operators who must comply with the EASA mandate to have radios that support 8.33 kHz channel spacing.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team <[[http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
